import { useState } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import Prodacts from "./Prodacts" function Edit(){ let Params= useParams() const [data,setdata]=useState([]) function FormSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() fetch(`http://localhost:9000/prodact`) .then(res=>res.json()) .then(data=>(setdata(data))) } console.log(data) return(

Updata the prodact

) } export default Edit
